      • getEventAnalyses

        public static java.util.List<NRequests> getEventAnalyses(AlertControl ac,
                                                         int numberOfMonths,
                                                         javax.persistence.EntityManager em)
        retrieves a a list of NRequests for an AlertControl and a given time range from the database
        Parameters:
        scp - the AlertControl used to select the entries
        months - the number of recent months the NRequests were persisted (calculated as 30 days)
        em - the entity manager for the database
        Returns:
        the NRequests associated with the alert control
